risk.content:
Anyone can create a token on Conflux/Ethereum with any name, including fake versions of existing tokens and tokens that claim to represent projects that do not have a token. Please take extra caution and do your research when interacting with arbitrary tokens.

When using ShuttleFlow, please make sure that the assets you operate are standard ERC20 tokens, otherwise there is a risk of fund security, and the users will need to borne all related consequences.
risk.title: Safety Tips
